title: SMC_SMOOTHPATHMODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_SMOOTHPATHMODE :
Defines the element type applied for the smoothing of the axes.

rows.Name: SP_SPLINE3
rows.Comment:
This mode inserts a spline of 3rd order, with different length of
tangents that define the spline.
In case ofSP_SPLINE3, this length is dependent from the length of
the neighbour object.

rows.Name: SP_SPLINE5
rows.Comment: This mode inserts a spline of 5th order.

rows.Name: SP_SPLINE3_CV
rows.Comment:
This mode inserts a spline of 3rd order, with different length of
tangents that define the spline.
In case ofSP_SPLINE3_CV, this length is dependent from the length
of the part of the neighbor object that has been cut off.
In case of two adjacent line objects,SP_SPLINE3_CVwill stay
inside the convex hull of the original path.

rows.Name: SP_SPLINE5_CV
rows.Comment:
This 5th oder spline is similar with 3rd order case.
Thereâs no guarantee that the curve will stay inside the convex hull.

rows.Name: SP_SPLINE5_MIN_CURVATURE
rows.Comment: Blending with polynomial of 5th degree of minimum curvature
